about_the_game:
Breekha is a psychological horror game set in one of the abandoned neighborhoods within an Arab city. The player takes on the task of unraveling the mystery of Breekha Hospital located in this district and understanding the reason behind the disappearance of corpses. Despite the efforts of many individuals to solve the hospital's puzzle, they vanished without a trace, placing the player in a challenging and mysterious situation.

Weapons in this harsh environment hold no value, as the player must hide and avoid confrontations, only resorting to weapons in unavoidable difficult situations. Illumination is nearly non-existent, and it cannot be relied upon for navigation and exploration of paths. Therefore, the player must personally search in the dark areas to find routes and clues.
